info.title: Verefoo REST API Online Swagger documentation
info.description: This is the automatically-generated documentation of the Verefoo's REST APIs, in the format of an openapi file, compliant with Swagger version 3, here shown in a user-friendly interface.

404.description: No requirement set has been found in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.
The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

delete.description: Be careful before cleaning the whole workbench of requirements.

304.description: No requirement set has been found.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: The requirement doesn't exist at all in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: The requirement set has not been found.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: The requirement doesn't exist at all in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

post.summary: Create another property in a requirement set

404.description: The requirements set has not been found.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

get.summary: Get a property from a requirement set

404.description: The property doesn't exist at all in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

put.summary: Update a property in a requirement set

424.description: The referred graph has not been found.

404.description: The property has not been found.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

delete.summary: Delete a property from a requirement set

404.description: The property doesn't exist at all in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

get.summary: Get the result of a past simulation
get.description: This API is not intended to run a new simulation.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: No simulation results currently exist in the workspace. You can start by performing a new simulation.

post.summary: Run a simulation by passing the actual NFV
post.description: This is an all-in-one service, since the relative data structures (like graphs) are created automatically and they will be retrievable with the pertinent APIs separately.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

delete.summary: Delete all the results of past simulations

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

304.description: No simulation results are in the workspace at all.

post.summary: Run a simulation by passing references to data structures
post.description: At the moment, neither network forwarding paths nor the parsing string can be passed; use the other simulation API instead.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: At least one resource referenced by some parameter doesn't exist in the workspace.

get.summary: Get the result of a past simulation
get.description: This API is not intended to run a new simulation.

404.description: The requested simulation doesn't exist in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

delete.summary: Delete the result of a past simulation

404.description: The requested simulation doesn't exist in the workspace.

delete.description: The list is deleted only if no connections exists.

delete.description: Be careful before cleaning the whole substrate workbench.

304.description: No substrate exists at all in the workspace.

delete.description: The operation deletes all the hosts and connections of the substrate accordingly.

404.description: The selected substrate doesn't exist at all.

put.summary: Change all the connections between hosts in a substrate.
put.description: The old connections will be lost.

404.description: The substrate doesn't exist. You can create a new substrate or refer to another one.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

424.description: The connections cannot be established between the hosts because at least one of them doesn't exist in the workspace.

post.summary: Create a list of connections between hosts in the substrate
post.description: The hosts must already exist. If some connections already exist, the new connections are just added; the duplicates are discarded.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

424.description: The connections cannot be established between the hosts because at least one of them doesn't exist in the workspace.

404.description: The graph doesn't exist at all.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

post.summary: Create a set of constraints in a graph
post.description: If the constraints already exists, the new ones replace them in a shallow way.

404.description: The graph doesn't exist at all.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

delete.summary: Delete all the constraints of a graph

404.description: The graph doesn't exist at all.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: No graphs currently exist in the workspace. You can start by creating a new graph

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

post.description: The graph's id in the request, if provided, is neglected; instead, the system automatically generates, stores the id for all the graphs and puts them in the response.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

delete.description: Be careful before cleaning the whole workbench of graphs.

424.description: No graph has been deleted because at least one of them is referred by other resources; you must first delete the interested resources.

304.description: No graph exists at all in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: The graph doesn't exist in the workspace.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

put.description: It's advisable to explicitly perform a get of the modified resource through the pertinent API, since some ids may have been changed.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: The graph or one of its sub-resources doesn't exist. Check the ids of the submitted resources.

delete.description: All the nested resources are deleted accordingly. In case the graph is referred by other resources, the operation is not performed and the workspace is not modified.

409.description: The graph could not be deleted because it is referenced by other resources; you must first delete the interested resources.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: The graph doesn't exist at all in the workspace.

post.description: The neighbours and the configuration are considered too eventually.

404.description: The graph doesn't exist at all.

400.description: The provided resource is not compliant with the data model.

404.description: The graph or the node doesn't exist at all.

put.description: All the nested resources are replaced in a shallow way, besides the neighbours; that field is totally neglected.
